description: This file defines an interface INotesRepository that specifies methods for managing notes, including retrieving all notes, getting a note by ID, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: INotesRepository
classes.description: Interface for notes repository providing CRUD operations for notes.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its unique identifier.
